pages.text: $(italic)If you got a dirt block whenever you mined an ore, and it fell right into lava, you'd have a whole lot of dirt.$(br2)No idea what you would do with that much dirt. Maybe give it to a friend who has just arrived here and needs shelter on his first night?$(br)Anyway, the dropping stuff into lava thing has to stop.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Puts broken blocks directly into your inventory instead of dropping them onto the ground.$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to mining tools, Shears and Spectrum's Fishing Rods.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a common Book with Inventory Insertion by surrounding your Enchanter with Pigment and the other required materials.
